page.title: 17TRANSPORT 4
page.content: Our visit to the R.A.F. Station gave us the chance to see inside some of the military transport. Sharon describes our departure."In the morning we went in cars to the R.A.F. Station. When we left school the cows were in the lane so we were delayed!We got a visitor's ticket at The Camp and parked. We left the cars and went to The Balloon Office. The man told us about balloons. Then we went to the hangar to see the tanks.We went in two tanks." James said,"It felt uncomfortable.The seats were made of wood. We looked out through the binoculars. I could see Mrs. Fenner. It was ace!" When we went to see a bus, Stuart pretended to be a driver. The transport moves to & from The Camp, but the balloon and basket remain for use in Hullavington.
